title: Montenegrin Rugby Union
text:
The Montenegrin Rugby Union () is the governing body for <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> in <a href="Montenegro">Montenegro</a>. It was founded in 2013, and became affiliated to <a href="Rugby%20Europe">Rugby Europe</a> in 2014.
